articles.description: APPLE fans have been put on alert about a dangerous new strain of malware that could leave you without access to your passwords and files. Here's what you need to know.
articles.content: There's often a mistaken belief that no viruses exist for Mac computers. And while it's true that historically there has never been the same amount of malware targeted at Mac compared with Windows, a… [+1764 chars]
